CONFLUENCE_URL.description: The URL of the Confluence site to connect to. Required for both Cloud and Server/Data Center deployments.
CONFLUENCE_URL.title: CONFLUENCE_URL

CONFLUENCE_USERNAME.description: The username for the Confluence account (email for Cloud). Required to authenticate with Confluence.
CONFLUENCE_USERNAME.title: CONFLUENCE_USERNAME

CONFLUENCE_TOKEN.description: The API token or personal access token for the Confluence account. Required for authentication with Confluence.
CONFLUENCE_TOKEN.title: CONFLUENCE_TOKEN

JIRA_URL.description: The URL of the Jira site to connect to. Required for both Cloud and Server/Data Center deployments.
JIRA_URL.title: JIRA_URL

JIRA_USERNAME.description: The username for the Jira account (email for Cloud). Required to authenticate with Jira.
JIRA_USERNAME.title: JIRA_USERNAME

JIRA_TOKEN.description: The API token or personal access token for the Jira account. Required for authentication with Jira.
JIRA_TOKEN.title: JIRA_TOKEN
